# The `EquivalenceClasses` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/equivalenceclasses">EquivalenceClasses</a> - This represents a collection of equivalence classes and supports three efficient operations: insert an element into a class of its own, union two classes, and find the class for a given element. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;class ElemTy, class Compare = std::less&lt;ElemTy&gt;&gt;
class llvm::EquivalenceClasses&lt;ElemTy, Compare&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/equivalenceclasses">EquivalenceClasses</a> - This represents a collection of equivalence classes and supports three efficient operations: insert an element into a class of its own, union two classes, and find the class for a given element.

In addition to these modification methods, it is possible to iterate over all of the equivalence classes and all of the elements in a class.

This implementation is an efficient implementation that only stores one copy of the element being indexed per entry in the set, and allows any arbitrary type to be indexed (as long as it can be ordered with operator&lt; or a comparator is provided).

Here is a simple example using integers:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a9dc0b27026bcd7953eada1a9f3c6d1c8">EquivalenceClasses&lt;int&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.unionSets(1, 2);                </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// insert 1, 2 into the same set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.insert(4); <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.insert(5);        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// insert 4, 5 into own sets</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.unionSets(5, 1);                </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// merge the set for 1 with 5&#39;s set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a9dc0b27026bcd7953eada1a9f3c6d1c8">EquivalenceClasses&lt;int&gt;::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">     <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;           </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterate over all of the equivalence sets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;isLeader()) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore non-leader sets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a9dc0b27026bcd7953eada1a9f3c6d1c8">EquivalenceClasses&lt;int&gt;::member&#95;iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.member&#95;begin(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">       <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.member&#95;end(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Loop over members in this set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">    cerr &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Print member.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  cerr &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Finish set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


This example prints: 4 5 1 2

### findLeader() {#a108b85871dae49e6793d7aeeac969c5f}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class ElemTy, class Compare = std::less&lt;ElemTy&gt;&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>member&#95;iterator llvm::EquivalenceClasses&lt; ElemTy, Compare &gt;::findLeader (<a href="#a0f6658f41713c51e16cb0eb989242c8f">iterator</a> I) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
findLeader - Given a value in the set, return a member iterator for the equivalence class it is in.

This does the path-compression part that makes union-find &quot;union findy&quot;. This returns an end iterator if the value is not in the equivalence class.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/equivalenceclasses-h/#l00228">228</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/equivalenceclasses-h">EquivalenceClasses.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### findValue() {#a08a0899420552a8b2359ed963c77daa8}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class ElemTy, class Compare = std::less&lt;ElemTy&gt;&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>iterator llvm::EquivalenceClasses&lt; ElemTy, Compare &gt;::findValue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> ElemTy &amp; V) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
findValue - Return an iterator to the specified value.

If it does not exist, <a href="#a7dff16816ce91085cecdc90e119356bc">end()</a> is returned.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/equivalenceclasses-h/#l00184">184</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/equivalenceclasses-h">EquivalenceClasses.h</a>.

### getLeaderValue() {#ac0ff4be03ce0a4d0b5b60c713db9aef3}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class ElemTy, class Compare = std::less&lt;ElemTy&gt;&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>const ElemTy &amp; llvm::EquivalenceClasses&lt; ElemTy, Compare &gt;::getLeaderValue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> ElemTy &amp; V) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
getLeaderValue - Return the leader for the specified value that is in the set.

It is an error to call this method for a value that is not yet in the set. For that, call getOrInsertLeaderValue(V).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/equivalenceclasses-h/#l00191">191</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/equivalenceclasses-h">EquivalenceClasses.h</a>.
